caption: Metadata
description: The Metadata object describes the metadata associated with the event.
name: metadata

uid.caption: Event UID
uid.description: The logging system-assigned unique identifier of an event instance.

version.description: The version of the OASF schema, using Semantic Versioning Specification (SemVer). For example: 1.0.0. Event consumers use the version to determine the available event attributes.
